TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Partitioner extends System.Object
public ref class Partitioner abstract sealed

summary.span: 为数组、列表和可枚举对象提供常见的分区策略。

span.span: Provides common partitioning strategies for arrays, lists, and enumerables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<TSource> Create<TSource> (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<TSource> source);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!TSource> source) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create(Of TSource) (source As IEnumerable(Of TSource)) As OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource)
static member Create : seq<'Source> -> System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<'Source>

typeparam.name: TSource
typeparam.span: 源可枚举项中的元素的类型。

span.span: Type of the elements in source enumerable.

param.name: source
param.span: 要进行分区的可枚举项。

span.span: The enumerable to be partitioned.

summary.span: 从 实例创建一个可排序分区程序。

span.span: Creates an orderable partitioner from a instance.

returns.span: 基于输入数组的可排序分区程序。

span.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建的分区程序中使用的排序由元素的自然顺序确定，这是从可枚举的源中检索的。The ordering used in the created partitioner is determined by the natural order of the elements as retrieved from the source enumerable. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[用于 PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information and examples, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<TSource> Create<TSource> (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<TSource> source, System.Collections.Concurrent.EnumerablePartitionerOptions partitionerOptions);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!TSource> source, valuetype System.Collections.Concurrent.EnumerablePartitionerOptions partitionerOptions) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create(Of TSource) (source As IEnumerable(Of TSource), partitionerOptions As EnumerablePartitionerOptions) As OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource)
static member Create : seq<'Source> * System.Collections.Concurrent.EnumerablePartitionerOptions -> System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<'Source>

typeparam.name: TSource
typeparam.span: 源可枚举项中的元素的类型。

span.span: Type of the elements in source enumerable.

param.name: source
param.span: 要进行分区的可枚举项。

span.span: The enumerable to be partitioned.

param.name: partitionerOptions
param.span: 控制分区缓冲行为的选项。

span.span: Options to control the buffering behavior of the partitioner.

summary.span: 从 实例创建一个可排序分区程序。

span.span: Creates an orderable partitioner from a instance.

returns.span: 基于输入数组的可排序分区程序。

span.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建的分区程序中使用的排序由元素的自然顺序确定，这是从可枚举的源中检索的。The ordering used in the created partitioner is determined by the natural order of the elements as retrieved from the source enumerable.

exception.span: 参数为 指定无效值。

span.span: The argument specifies an invalid value for .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<TSource> Create<TSource> (System.Collections.Generic.IList<TSource> list, bool loadBalance);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!!TSource> list, bool loadBalance) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create(Of TSource) (list As IList(Of TSource), loadBalance As Boolean) As OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource)
static member Create : System.Collections.Generic.IList<'Source> * bool -> System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<'Source>

typeparam.name: TSource
typeparam.span: 源列表中的元素的类型。

span.span: Type of the elements in source list.
The list to be partitioned.

param.name: loadBalance
param.span: 一个布尔值，该值指示创建的分区程序是否应在各分区之间保持动态负载平衡，而不是静态负载平衡。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the created partitioner should dynamically load balance between partitions rather than statically partition.

summary.span: 从 实例创建一个可排序分区程序。

span.span: Creates an orderable partitioner from an instance.

returns.span: 基于输入列表的可排序分区程序。

span.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[用于 PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information and examples, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).
